Enums/SummarizedProbabilitiesError.html#.name: qubitsAreNotInsideBounds
Enums/SummarizedProbabilitiesError.html#.abstract: Throwed when qubits references a qubit that does not exist in the circuit

Enums/SummarizedProbabilitiesError.html#.name: qubitsCanNotBeAnEmptyList
Enums/SummarizedProbabilitiesError.html#.abstract: Throwed when qubits does not specify any qubit, i.e. it is empty

Enums/GroupedProbabilitiesError.html#/s:.name: groupQubitsCanNotBeAnEmptyList
Enums/GroupedProbabilitiesError.html#/s:.abstract: Throwed when groupQubits does not specify any qubit, i.e. it is empty

Enums/GroupedProbabilitiesError.html#/s:.name: qubitsAreNotInsideBounds
Enums/GroupedProbabilitiesError.html#/s:.abstract: Throwed when groupQubits and/or summaryQubits references a qubit that does not exist in the circuit

Enums/MakeStatevectorError.html#/s:21Swi.name: vectorCountHasToBeAPowerOfTwo
Enums/MakeStatevectorError.html#/s:21Swi.abstract: Throwed when the length of vector is not a power of 2. An vector represents all possible qubit combinations,

Enums/UnitaryError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantu.name: circuitCanNotBeAnEmptyList
Enums/UnitaryError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantu.abstract: Throwed when the circuit has no gate from which to produce an unitary matrix

Enums/UnitaryError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantu.name: resultingMatrixIsNotUnitary
Enums/UnitaryError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantu.abstract: Throwed when the resulting matrix lost too much precision after applying gates

Enums/StatevectorError.html#/s:21SwiftQu.name: resultingStatevectorAdditionOfSquareModulusIsNotEqualToOne
Enums/StatevectorError.html#/s:21SwiftQu.abstract: Throwed when the resulting state vector lost too much precision after applying gates

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: circuitQubitCountHasToBeBiggerThanZero
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when the number of qubits (informed or inferred) to create a circuit is 0

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: gateInputCountDoesNotMatchGateMatrixQubitCount
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when a gate does not use as many qubits as its matrix is able to handle

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: gateInputsAreNotInBound
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when a gate references one or more qubits that do not exist

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: gateInputsAreNotUnique
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when a gate references same qubit/s multiple times

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: gateMatrixHandlesMoreQubitsThatCircuitActuallyHas
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when a gate requires more qubits that the circuit actually has

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: gateMatrixIsNotUnitary
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when the matrix provided by a gate is not unitary

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: gateMatrixRowCountHasToBeAPowerOfTwo
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when the number of rows in a matrix used to build a quantum gate is not a power of 2. A matrix has to

Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.name: gateOracleControlsCanNotBeAnEmptyList
Enums/GateError.html#/s:21SwiftQuantumCo.abstract: Throwed when a Gate.oracle(truthTable:target:controls:) without controls is used in a circuit

Enums/GateError.html.name: GateError
Enums/GateError.html.abstract: Errors throwed while acting on or using a Gate in a Circuit
